医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
tolebrutinib表现出有望治疗非贴次次要进行性多发性硬化症一项由克利夫兰诊所主导的临床试验是托莱布鲁替尼（Tolebrutinib）是一项研究性口服布鲁顿的酪氨酸激酶抑制剂，这是一组用于治疗淋巴瘤和相关血液疾病的药物，在六个月的六个月内延迟了31％的残疾延迟，确认的残疾进展（CDP）是非次要次要多重绩效（splaps splass spm spmss）的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/tolebrutinib-shows-promise-promise-for-promise-for-treating-non-relapsing-soncormers----------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/tolebrutinib-shows-promise-promise-for-promise-for-treating-non-relapsing-shorp------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2353c9e-59da-4d2a-4d2a-ac0b-03642ab22222222 Tue, 08 Apr 2025 22:40:29 -0400 Tolebrutinib shows promise for treating non-relapsing secondary progressive multiple sclerosis
新药化合物可防止小鼠长期的互联症状研究人员表明，一种新药物可以预防小鼠长期的互联症状，这是一个具有里程碑意义的发现，可能会导致未来的衰弱状况治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/new-drug-compound-prevents-prevents-covid-covid-symptoms-in-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/new-drug-compren-prevents-prevents-long-covid-symptoms-in-symptoms-in-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4318915b-c300-47c2-a889-31eeee5453a7 Tue, 08 Apr 2025 22:35:09 -0400 New drug compound prevents long COVID symptoms in mice

焦虑会促进情绪饮食和体重增加，研究发现情绪饮食和身体不满介导BMI变化与心理健康之间的联系。这些社会心理因素解释了焦虑，抑郁和体重如何随着时间的流逝而相互关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/anxiety-fuels-emotional-emotional-eating-and-weight-weight------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/anxiety-fuels-emotional-emotional-eating-and-weight-weight------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d71bd306-9215-4721-4721-AFD7-94E2BE828BB3 Tue, 08 Apr 2025 22:18:00 -0400 Anxiety fuels emotional eating and weight gain, study finds
血管中缺乏神经酰胺可能导致与肥胖有关的心脏病Weill Cornell Medicine的新研究发现了肥胖症和糖尿病中的基本心血管疾病的令人惊讶的罪魁祸首，而不是某些脂肪的存在，而是它们的抑制作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/lack-of-ceramides-in-blood-blood-vessels-could-could-could-could-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-red-hard diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250408/lack-of-ceramides-in-blood-blood-vessels-could-could-could-could-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45F039C7-8928-4C1D-BF04-BF04-B73C3056400F Tue, 08 Apr 2025 22:03:46 -0400 Lack of ceramides in blood vessels could lead to obesity-related heart diseases
